item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>True and the other upside is that I don't have to do email support for people when I go to meetings any more <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: True and the other upside is that I don’t have to do email support for people when I go to meetings any more http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

item.title: By: Philip Storry
item.dc:creator: Philip Storry
item.description: <p>Bummer.<br/><br /><br/><br />Still, just think what you've gained. I'm sure that your new quota regime will allow you to strategically lose many more emails!<br/><br /><br/><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /><br/><br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
Bummer.

Still, just think what you’ve gained. I’m sure that your new quota regime will allow you to strategically lose many more emails!

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />
